Find Items with No Callers Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Right-click the project root in the Project Explorer window and select Find Items with No Callers from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to find all top-level project items with no callers.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • List of items with no callers—Lists all top-level items with no callers found.
  • Go To—Highlights the selected search result in the Project Explorer window. You also can double-click the result to highlight it.

You also can use the Find:Items with No Callers property to find items with no callers programmatically.
